title: There’s A Beauty - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Mature   Romance   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Age Progression   Age Regression   Ancient Times   Androgynous Characters   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Child Abuse   Child Protagonist   Childish Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Episodic   Futuristic Setting   Genius Protagonist   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Older Love Interests   Reincarnation   Time Skip   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Casanovanic Bookworm   Feng Liu Shu Dai   風流書呆   风流书呆
description:
Once upon a time, there was a beauty who met nonstop misfortune. This unfortunate man hurried to hug a golden thigh…  

Coming from the end of days, the ‘excluding eating there’s only eating in his brain’ Little Useless Eater transmigrated to a ghost story world where it’s difficult to preserve his life. 

Good that, not only does his IQ explode the meter, all attribute points are also entirely placed on his face, letting him rely on his otherworldly beauty to find a thick and sturdy big golden thigh. Hugging from world to world, finally, from a pitiful thing being oppressed by demons and monsters on every path, he evolved into a vexatious ghost!>
